_doc: Spell definition config. See MONSTER_SPELLS.md for full documentation.
spell_definition_overrides: Change what a spell DOES (damage, mp, element, scaling)
Affects ALL casters (players + monsters). Pick spell by list + index.
For overlay bitfield patches (which offensive spells monsters HAVE),
damage           = flat damage bonus added after stat scaling (0-255)
mp_cost          = mana cost (0-255, byte +0x14 in 48-byte entry)
Lower = more powerful for high-INT casters. Monster spells use 1.
